name: Reinforce (Skill Card)
text:
Paladin / Skill / Hero Power
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
You cannot use this Skill on your first turn.
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can activate this Skill: 
? Special Summon 1 "Silver Hand Recruit Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500). It cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon or used as Extra Deck material, unless it is for a LIGHT Fairy or LIGHT Warrior monster.
§3Hearthstone Rule:
This Skill can be used on your first turn. This Skill costs 2 Mana to use.§r
